name: Ayesha Rahman
shortDescription: Barrister Ayesha Rahman is a seasoned criminal lawyer with over 8 years of courtroom experience. She has successfully defended clients in complex criminal cases and is known for her assertive legal strategies.

name: Farhan Ahmed
shortDescription: Farhan Ahmed specializes in family law, dealing with divorce, child custody, and alimony cases for over 5 years. He is known for his empathetic approach and client-focused solutions.

name: Nusrat Jahan
shortDescription: Advocate Nusrat Jahan has been practicing corporate law for over a decade, helping businesses with legal compliance, contracts, and mergers. Her in-depth legal insight is trusted by many top companies.

name: Shakil Hossain
shortDescription: Shakil Hossain is a civil law expert with 7+ years of experience handling property disputes, contractual matters, and civil litigation. His clients appreciate his professionalism and efficiency.

name: Tanzim Haque
shortDescription: Tanzim Haque is a tax lawyer with 9+ years of experience in corporate and personal tax advisory. He assists individuals and businesses with audits, tax planning, and dispute resolution.

name: Meherun Nesa
shortDescription: Meherun Nesa has been practicing environmental law for 6 years, advocating for sustainable development and legal compliance in environmental matters. She supports NGOs and industries alike.

name: Omar Faruk
shortDescription: With 11+ years in immigration law, Omar Faruk provides expert legal support for visa, residency, and citizenship cases. He has helped hundreds navigate complex immigration procedures.

name: Kazi Anika
shortDescription: Kazi Anika is a dedicated property law specialist with 4+ years of experience handling land disputes, real estate agreements, and property transfer cases with great attention to detail.

name: Samiul Islam
shortDescription: Samiul Islam is a rising expert in cyber law, helping clients with data privacy, cybercrime cases, and IT legal compliance. His modern legal approach suits todayâ€™s digital challenges.

name: Faria Kabir
shortDescription: Faria Kabir is a labour law specialist with over 6 years of experience. She works closely with both employers and employees on issues like workplace disputes, termination, and contracts.

name: Nazmul Haque
shortDescription: Nazmul Haque has been practicing international law for 12+ years, offering legal expertise in cross-border disputes, trade regulations, and international treaties. He serves global clients.

name: Jannatul Ferdous
shortDescription: Advocate Jannatul Ferdous is dedicated to protecting human rights. With 7 years of experience, she works on cases involving civil liberties, gender justice, and social justice advocacy.
